titles.title: Child Nutrition Technical Assistance Act of 2022
Child Nutrition Technical Assistance Act of 2022
To amend the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to provide for technical assistance relating to nutrition standards for school meal programs, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Child Nutrition Technical Assistance Act of 2022
This bill revises food and nutrition programs of the Department of Agriculture (USDA) by directing USDA to provide for technical assistance relating to nutrition standards for the school meal programs, including by awarding competitive grants to assist food service personnel in meeting the nutrition standards under such programs.
